configuration.application_title: COVID-19 Medical Resource Demand Dashboard - US National

scenarios.description: The Adaptive Fitting Projection model fits each HRR region precisely, using recent trends to guide the future projections. This scenario assumes typical COVID-19 hospitalizations last about 7 days. Updated 2021-01-13.

The Adaptive-BestPastControl Fitting Projection model fits each HRR region precisely, using recent trends to guide the future projections; however, it also looks at transmission levels since May 2020, and transitions (over the next two months) from the current transmission level to the lowest transmission level experienced so far. Updated 2021-01-13.

The Adaptive-FatigueControl Fitting Projection model fits each HRR region precisely, using recent trends to guide the future projections; however, it also looks at transmission levels since May 2020, and transitions (over the next two months) from the current transmission level to the highest transmission level experienced so far. Updated 2021-01-13.
